title: Introduction to C Programming
info: Explore the fundamentals of C programming, from variables to control structures. Kickstart your journey into the world of coding with this foundational course.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
info: Dive into the world of algorithms, learning their design and analysis. Master problem-solving and efficiency in this essential computer science course.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
info: Unlock C++ for Data Structures and Algorithms. Learn syntax, data types, and object-oriented principles to ace coding interviews and problem-solving challenges.

title: Basic Data Structures
info: Build a strong foundation in data structures: arrays, linked lists, trees, and more. Enhance your problem-solving skills and algorithms knowledge.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
info: Discover Object-Oriented Programming in Python. Create reusable classes, objects, and master the art of code organization for efficient software development.

title: Software Engineering
info: Learn Software Engineering principles, including design, testing, and project management. Develop the skills to create robust and scalable software systems.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
info: Explore AWS and Cloud Computing. Harness the power of cloud services for scalability, reliability, and cost-effective infrastructure management in your projects.

title: Database (MySQL)
info: Master MySQL database management. From designing schemas to querying data, gain expertise in one of the most widely used relational database systems.

title: Problem-Solving Part
info: Enhance your problem-solving prowess. Tackle coding challenges, algorithms, and logical thinking to excel in coding interviews and real-world scenarios.
